formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'OSPFinish' =-
[Synopsis] Record OSP entry
[Description] OSPFinish([status[,options]]): Records call state for ${OSPINHANDLE}, according to status, which should be one of BUSY, CONGESTION, ANSWER, NOANSWER, or CHANUNAVAIL or coincidentally, just what the Dial application stores in its ${DIALSTATUS}.
This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: OSPFINISHSTATUS The status of the OSP Finish attempt as a text string, one of SUCCESS | FAILED | ERROR

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
